name: BlowUp
description:
This game is about the self-torture of a person who has lost all hope in life. 

He has nothing left: neither a family, nor at home, nor money. 

For him, life has lost all meaning, so he spends his last clock in self-destruction. 

In my presentation of the game, the platforms mean the latest islands of hopes by which you can still get out of the abyss of self-flagellation, but the main character prefers not to be leading to false hopes, and instead tries to destroy as many such islands of hope as possible at a time. 

My game shows how hard it is for people who experience the same suffering as the main character.

Control:

Movement - a/s, space;

Installation of Thoughts N’ Tears (TNT) - E;

Installation of Destructive thoughts (DT) - RMB

P.S. The game was written in 6 hours in a hurry, so it turned out to be a little raw
